intro:
A heartwarming tale of the bond between a dragon hatchling and a girl transforming into a dragon!
"It would be wonderful if we could meet again someday."
description:
'Humans' and 'Monsters' inhabit this world.

Yuzuki, a student studying 'Monsters,' gets lost in the forest for a school project.
Overcome with hunger, she eats an apple she finds.
However, that apple was intended for a 'Monster' she encounters in the forest—a dragon hatchling named 'Piko'....

"Gyao! Gya, gya. Gyu, gyao!"
"...Come again?"

And then, after eating the apple, a change began to manifest in Yuzuki...
"Huh?! H-Horns?!
Wha... What the heck?!
Why do I have horns?!
What's happening to me?!"

Will Yuzuki ever be able to return to her 'Human' form?

MONPIC is a short fantasy adventure game where you can experience a captivating story of 'Monsters' and 'Humans' while enjoying a point-and-click exploration game. 

Guide Yuzuki and Piko on their journey.
